name: I'll Defeat the Monster From the Comfort of My Bed! Power Nap Edition
name_original: I'll Defeat the Monster From the Comfort of My Bed! Power Nap Edition
description:
A monster is bearing down on the town of Gervasburg and it's up to the local witch to defeat it - but she's too lazy to seek it out! She instead enlists her curmudgeonly attendant, Norbert, to scour the town in search of three items needed to bring the monster to them.

- Explore the town of Gervasburg and complete its three dungeons in any order
- Challenging battles in which the protagonist and his familiar share an MP pool
- Enemy encounters are fixed and one-time-only - no randomness, no enemies chasing you
- Approximate length: 2 hours

IDM! PNE is a greatly enhanced and improved version of a game released for an offsite community event in 2020. It boasts a complete gameplay overhaul, additional scenes and dialogue changes, and new features and quality of life improvements.
